Description: A California-based medical diagnostics and life sciences manufacturing and sales company, Bio-Rad Laboratories Inc., agreed to pay a $14.35 million penalty to resolve allegations that it violated the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act by falsifying its books and records and failing to implement adequate internal controls in connection with sales it made in Russia.

Agency: California Department of Toxic Substances Control
